column2: Name
Description
The Perfect Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]

[This.GetFirstName] was a [This.GetManWoman] of towering intellect and unparallel strength and beauty. [This.GetSheHeCap] is widely considered the pinnacle of the human race, some, even consider [This.GetHerHim] of Godly descent.
The Zealous Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.GetFirstName] has proven [This.GetHerselfHimself] as one of the most zealous ruler time and time again, making [This.GetHerHis] name indelible in the annals of history.
The Greedy Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.GetFirstName] was known for [This.GetHerHis] extremely greedy nature, trying to aqcuire every bit of wealth [This.GetSheHe] came upon.
Blood Of Honor
[This.GetFirstName] is considered by many, one of the most honorary [This.GetManWoman] in [This.GetHerHis] realm, gaining the trust of [This.GetHerHis] vassals and common people alike.
The Cynical Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
Rumors suggest that [This.GetFirstName] has never felt any emotion in his life. [This.GetSheHeCap] has no regard for the divine and for that, [This.GetSheHe] will surely burn in hell.
The Great Blood of the [This.GetOnlyDynastyName] Dynasty

The Dynasty of [This.GetOnlyDynastyName] has made it's name in the medieval world through countless acts of great diplomacy, organisation and conquest. Their name shall live on for a thousand more generations!
The Great Diplomat Bloodline

[This.GetFirstName] was uncontested in matters of diplomacy. [This.GetHerHisCap] name and bloodline will be remembered, for [This.GetSheHe] shall be one the greatest diplomats that lived in the medieval world.
The Great Commander Bloodline

[This.GetFirstName] was uncontested in matters of warfare. [This.GetHerHisCap] name and bloodline will be remembered, for [This.GetSheHe] shall be one the greatest commanders that lived in the medieval world.
The Great Steward Bloodline

[This.GetFirstName] was uncontested in matters of stewardship. [This.GetHerHisCap] name and bloodline will be remembered, for [This.GetSheHe] shall be one the greatest stewards that lived in the medieval world.
The Great Spymaster Bloodline

[This.GetFirstName] was uncontested in matters of intrigue. [This.GetHerHisCap] name and bloodline will be remembered, for [This.GetSheHe] shall be one the greatest spymasters that lived in the medieval world.
The Great Philosopher Bloodline

[This.GetFirstName] rivaled the Classical Era's great philosophers. [This.GetHerHisCap] name and bloodline will be remembered, for [This.GetSheHe] shall be one the greatest philosophers humanity has ever known.
The Mastermind Bloodline
An excellent diplomat, an ingenius commander, a brilliant administrator, an outstanding spy and a thoughtful philosopher, [This.GetFirstName] was a [This.GetManWoman] everyone aspired to.
The Charitable Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]

A charitable person, [This.GetFirstName] always gave to those who needed it the most. [This.GetSheHeCap] was famous among the nobility, the clergy and the common people. [This.GetHerHisCap] realm prospered under [This.GetHerHis] rule.
The Deceitful Bloodline of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
A deceitful person, [This.GetFirstName] always lurked in the shadows, going about [This.GetHerHis] business in complete secrecy.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] The Slothful
Rarely leaving [This.GetHerHis] personal castle and guard, [This.GetFirstName] was a textbook case of slothful person.
The Possessed Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]

[This.GetFirstName]'s dreams were frequently visions of the future, probably a work of the devil himself. While this gave [This.GetHerHim] an advantage in intrigue and battle, [This.GetSheHe] was not very popular among the clergy.
The Ambitious Bloodline of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.GetFirstName] always dreamt of expanding [This.GetHerHis] money coffers and realm's borders, and make [This.GetHerHis] culture dominate the known world.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] The Rational
Using logic and facts, [This.GetFirstName] was an efficient problem solver, capable of running a realm with justice, efficiency, and fairness.
The Sinister Bloodline of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
Having a personality that goes directly against the teachings of the church, [This.GetFirstName] and [This.GetHerHis] ancestors will have a place in the deepest dungeons of hell.
The virtuous Bloodline of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
A truly pious person ,[This.GetFirstName] was a model [This.Religion.GetName] ruler. Heaven awaits [This.GetHerHim] and [This.GetHerHis] ancestors.
The Conqueror of Western Europe
[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow and encompass all of Western Europe. [This.GetHerHisCap] military achievements are comparable, to those of Great Roman Emperors.
The Conqueror of Northern Europe
[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow and encompass all of Northern Europe. [This.GetHerHisCap] military achievements are comparable, to those of Great Roman Emperors.
The Conqueror of Eastern Europe
[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow and encompass all of Eastern Europe. [This.GetHerHisCap] military achievements are comparable, to those of Great Roman Emperors.
The Conqueror of Southern Europe
[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow and encompass all of Southern Europe. [This.GetHerHisCap] military achievements are comparable, to those of Great Roman Emperors.
The Conqueror of the Western Steppes
[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow and encompass all of the Western Steppes. [This.GetHerHisCap] military achievements are comparable, to those of Great Roman Emperors.
The Conqueror of North Africa
[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow and encompass all of North Africa. [This.GetHerHisCap] military achievements are comparable, to those of Great Roman Emperors.
The Conqueror of South Africa
[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow and encompass all of South Africa. [This.GetHerHisCap] military achievements are comparable, to those of Great Roman Emperors.
The Conqueror of the Middle East
[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow and encompass all of the Middle East. [This.GetHerHisCap] military achievements are comparable, to those of Great Roman Emperors.
The Conqueror of Central Asia
[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow and encompass all of Central Asia. [This.GetHerHisCap] military achievements are comparable, to those of Great Roman Emperors.
The Conqueror of India
[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow and encompass all of India. [This.GetHerHisCap] military achievements are comparable, to those of Great Roman Emperors.
The Great Conqueror of Africa

[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow to such a size, encompassing all of Africa, rivaling even the Chinese Empire in land area, population and wealth. Alexander the Great, would be jealous of [This.GetHerHis] accomplishments.
The Great Conqueror of Europe

[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow to such a size, encompassing all of Europe, rivaling even the Chinese Empire in land area, population and wealth. Alexander the Great, would be jealous of [This.GetHerHis] accomplishments.
The Great Conqueror of the Steppes

[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow to such a size, encompassing all of the Steppes, rivaling even the Chinese Empire in land area, population and wealth. Alexander the Great, would be jealous of [This.GetHerHis] accomplishments.
The Great Conqueror of Central Asia

[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow to such a size, encompassing all of Central Asia, rivaling even the Chinese Empire in land area, population and wealth. Alexander the Great, would be jealous of [This.GetHerHis] accomplishments.
The Great Conqueror of the Middle East

[This.GetFirstName] has made [This.GetHerHis] realm grow to such a size, encompassing all of the Middle East, rivaling even the Chinese Empire in land area, population and wealth. Alexander the Great, would be jealous of [This.GetHerHis] accomplishments.
The Schismatic Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]

Driven by [This.GetHerHis] greed of power, [This.GetFirstName] is responsible for the schism of the Catholic Church. [This.GetHerHisCap] actions have reduced the power of the Pope, damaging the reputation of the office.
The Autocephalous Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
In this blatant show of greed, arrogance and ambition, [This.GetTitledFirstName] has shown that nothing stands between [This.GetHerHim] and [This.GetHerHis] glory.
The Fertile Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.GetFirstName] was known for [This.GetHerHis] lustful ways, having as many as 30 children! Taking special care for all his children, [This.GetSheHe] is a model [This.GetFatherMother].
The Lawmaker Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]

Bringing [This.GetHerHis] people out of the old ways and introducing them to civilization, [This.GetFirstName] will be remembered, for [This.GetSheHe] accomplished a great feat towards empowering [This.GetHerHis] realm.
The Uniter Of the Kingdoms
Under [This.GetHerHis] banner, The Isles now belong to the [This.GetAdjective] crown. [This.GetHerHisCap] accomplishments of diplomacy, warfare and development will be remembered through the ages.
Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName] The Great

Under an extremely short amount of time, [This.GetFirstName] managed to build a mighty empire, starting [This.GetHerHis] reign only ruling a few settlements. [This.GetHerHisCap] military victories are comparable to those of Alexander The Great. As such, [This.GetHerHis] name will live on through the ages, giving inspiration to new generations of Great Conquerors.
The Lasting [This.GetOnlyDynastyName] Dynasty
The [This.GetOnlyDynastyName] Dynasty has been on the forefront of politics in Europe for multiple generations, marking their name in the history books.
The Prester Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.GetFirstName] has managed to reach the lands which Prester John, a legendary Christian patriarch, likely ruled. Now, [This.GetFirstName] can claim Prester John's holyness!
The Tsarist Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
After countless battles against enemy tribes, hordes and feudal overlords, [This.GetFirstName] has managed to unite the Russian Lands and proclaim [This.GetHerselfHimself] the first Tsar of Russia.
The Blood of the Holy Protector
[This.GetFirstName] has managed to have the most important holy sites of the Abrahamic religions under [This.GetHerHis] realm. The religious world will never be the same again.
The Blood of the Great Pentarch
[This.GetFirstName] has managed to have the most important holy sites of Orthodox Christianity under [This.GetHerHis] realm. The religious world will never be the same again.
The Blood of the Novus Augustus
[This.GetFirstName] has managed to reclaim some of the previous glory of The Roman Empire, and ressurect the Greatest Empire that has ever existed.
The Blood of the Magnus Augustus
[This.GetFirstName] has managed to reclaim all of the glory of The Roman Empire, and make it once again, the Greatest Empire that has ever existed.
Prophesied's Bloodline

[This.GetFirstName] has become the new prophet of the Zoroastrian people. Truly, a great, pious and respected religious leader, bringing Zoroastrianism on the forefront of religions in the Middle East.
Blood of the First King

[This.GetFirstName] has managed to accomplish a feat which many of [This.GetHerHis] ancestors could only dream about: bringing the Promised Land back to it's people, and making it the stronghold of Judaism.
The Hateful Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.GetFirstName] will be remembered as one of the most hated rulers among all nobles.
Beloved Liege Blood
[This.GetFirstName] will be remembered as one of the most beloved rulers among every noble.
